job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the integration of AI capabilities into existing software architecture, which is a core aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: This indicates responsibility for the full lifecycle of a product, a key element of software engineering ownership and delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core activities of building and integrating applications, encompassing both front-end and back-end development, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase involves working with LLMs to create specific features and tools, which aligns with the application of LLMs, often involving prompt engineering or building interactive AI features.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights responsibility for the end-to-end development lifecycle, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration and partnership with a diverse team, fitting the communication and collaboration category.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes ongoing learning and adaptation to new technologies, which is the definition of learning and adaptability.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of building and delivering functional applications, which is a primary software development responsibility.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
communicate complex ideas simply and effectively
continually learning and applying the latest advancements

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as architecting and coding full-stack web applications, taking ownership of the entire development process, and integrating AI components. While it involves working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude, the primary focus is on building and delivering AI-powered applications rather than deep AI model development or specialized GenAI framework work. The role requires integrating AI into existing systems and products, fitting the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software that uses AI as a core part of its functionality.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining the blend of software engineering and AI responsibilities. The 'what you will NOT be doing' section further clarifies the scope, leaving little room for ambiguity regarding the role's primary focus on application development.
